newsitem.title: USA: Avant! plans conference call for Friday.
newsitem.headline: Avant! plans conference call for Friday.

text.p: A spokesman for Avant! Corp said Chairman and Chief Executive Officer Gerald Hsu will hold a telephone conference call to make a news announcement at 1100 PDT/1800 GMT, Friday.
The spokesman declined to comment on the news announcement. He said he company would issue a press release at some point today.
Avant!, a developer of software used in the production of integrated circuits, had its stock halted for news dissemination earlier today. Before trading stopped, the shares had climbed 3-7/8 to 25.
